item.title: 【Albums (lossless)】FLAC - Madonna - The Confessions Tour (Complete Edition) - DTS 5.1/LPCM 2.0 24bit/48kHz - 2007
item.description:
The Confessions Tour is the second live album by American singer and songwriter Madonna. It was released on January 26, 2007, by Warner Bros. Records. Directed by Jonas Åkerlund, the album chronicles Madonna's 2006 Confessions Tour.
